com.ikarus.ScanService

Class XMLExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikarus.ScanService.XMLExtractor

  • public class XMLExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the interface to parse an XML file conforming to the XML Schema for HL7 Clinical Document Architecture (CDA), extract the nodes "value", "desc" and "text" and scan their content for malicious software and viruses.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLExtractor(java.lang.String connectionString, java.lang.String tmpFolder)
      Constructs an object that encapsulates the parsing and scanning of XML files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This function provides a wrapper to parse and scan an XML file, for which a result summary will be printed to the standard output.
      XMLScanResult scanXML(java.lang.String filename)
      This is the central function that parses an XML file, extracts all nodes that match "text", "desc" or "value" and send them to IKARUS scan.server.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLExtractor

        public XMLExtractor(java.lang.String connectionString,
                    java.lang.String tmpFolder)
        Constructs an object that encapsulates the parsing and scanning of XML files.
        Parameters:
        connectionString - Full qualified HTTP URL that describes where to find the IKARUS scan.server (e.g. http://127.0.0.1/virusscan).
        tmpFolder - Path to a folder in which temporary files (i.e. extracted elements) can be stored.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This function provides a wrapper to parse and scan an XML file, for which a result summary will be printed to the standard output.
        Parameters:
        args - Usage: com.ikarus.ScanService.XMLExtract
         <full qualified URL containing the port and the protocol>
         <temporary path to extract files to>
         <XML file to be scanned>
        For example: http://127.0.0.1/virusscan c:\tmp eicar_com.7z

      • scanXML

        public XMLScanResult scanXML(java.lang.String filename)
        This is the central function that parses an XML file, extracts all nodes that match "text", "desc" or "value" and send them to IKARUS scan.server. Finally, the scan results are returned.
        Parameters:
        filename - Absolute path to the XML file that should be parsed and scanned.
        Returns:
        XMLScanResult object that includes information about all scanned XML nodes
